divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling on rt 347 south bound when i noticed a orange flickering object flying from sse on a nnw direction.at first i thought it was a star but after stopping the vehicle i noticed it was moving a rate faster than a prop plane but slower than a jet I could not tell how hi it was or how big. I do not believe it was aircraft due to the color.avoca airport is not far away and I am used to seeing different types of aircraft.It was much different than any aircraft in the area.I only observed it for a short duration due to the fact that the road is on a mountain pass and no place to pull off the road.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Scranton
There were no other sightings in Scranton on or around January 21st 2010
Summary: An orange object flying on a SSE to a NNW flight path while traveling rt 347
